The video clip was published on Facebook: 2020, and has been viewed more than 5,000 times.
The caption of the post claimed that it: 3. Similar footage with the same claim was shared on Facebook and YouTube, stating that the sighting occurred in the Horton Plains, a national park in southern Sri Lanka.
A Google reverse image search using InVI: WeVerify found that the footage had actually circulated in social media posts about a black leopard sighting in south India in 2010.
